# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

find_package(linux-headers-generic REQUIRED)

add_executable(yt-cpp-mapreduce-library-parallel_io-ut_core_http)


target_compile_options(yt-cpp-mapreduce-library-parallel_io-ut_core_http PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
  -Wimplicit-fallthrough
)

target_link_libraries(yt-cpp-mapreduce-library-parallel_io-ut_core_http PUBLIC
  linux-headers-generic::linux-headers-generic
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-gtest
  mapreduce-library-parallel_io
  parallel_io-ut-proto
  cpp-mapreduce-client
  cpp-mapreduce-interface
  cpp-mapreduce-util
  mapreduce-tests-yt_unittest_lib
  mapreduce-tests-gtest_main
  tests-native-proto_lib
  mapreduce-tests-lib
)

target_allocator(yt-cpp-mapreduce-library-parallel_io-ut_core_http
  cpp-malloc-jemalloc
)

target_link_options(yt-cpp-mapreduce-library-parallel_io-ut_core_http PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lutil
)

target_sources(yt-cpp-mapreduce-library-parallel_io-ut_core_http PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/cpp/mapreduce/library/parallel_io/ut/parallel_reader_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/cpp/mapreduce/library/parallel_io/ut/parallel_writer_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/cpp/mapreduce/library/parallel_io/ut/parallel_file_writer_ut.cpp
)


set_property(
  TARGET
  yt-cpp-mapreduce-library-parallel_io-ut_core_http
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  1
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  yt-cpp-mapreduce-library-parallel_io-ut_core_http
  TEST_TARGET
  yt-cpp-mapreduce-library-parallel_io-ut_core_http
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  yt-cpp-mapreduce-library-parallel_io-ut_core_http
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  yt-cpp-mapreduce-library-parallel_io-ut_core_http
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
  "YT_TESTS_USE_CORE_HTTP_CLIENT=yes"
)

vcs_info(yt-cpp-mapreduce-library-parallel_io-ut_core_http)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  yt-cpp-mapreduce-library-parallel_io-ut_core_http
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
